items.name: Weligton
items.text: Márcia Freitas, I need to tell you: this LED light technique course was a game-changer. I am simply enchanted with the technique. The agility that LED brings to the procedure and the retention it delivers are surreal. Seeing the client leaving with ready lashes, without fear of humidity and with such clean finishing, gave me enormous confidence. It was a wonderful investment, thank you for encouraging me!

items.name: Inês
items.text: Márcia is an esthetician by vocation. Talented and courageous, she built her path with dedication and sensitivity. Punctual and respectful with each client, she transmits confidence from the first contact. She is always evolving, seeking to learn, perfect techniques and offer the best. I have known her for over 12 years and, over time, we became friends. Her work goes beyond aesthetics: it reveals care, professionalism and love for what she does.
